column1: Uchi////We then moved on to the Wagyu Hot Rock
column3: and Pork Belly. The Wagyu was unsurprisingly melt-in-your-mouth amazing and the pork belly was cooked to perfection. The bluefin maki was such a nice surprise. The orange really sent the roll in an unexpected
column4: but delightful direction. We finished with the Sake Namida
column6: and the Fried Milk for desert.
